attributes.action: Exempt any form of tax on 4x4's or people carriers for owners with 4 children or more.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a hard working family with 4 children we have no choice but to drive a large 7 seater car.  This is not a choice for us but a necesity.  Why should we have to pay more tax for having a larger family. Similarly, we frequently take passengers which in turn saves other users on the road. If 4x4 or MPV users can prove the size of their family warrants this size car, they should be exempt.
